content: व्यय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Liable to change, mutable, perishable; <ab>cf.</ab> अव्यय. --यः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Loss, disappearance, destruction; आपाद्यते न व्ययमंतरायैः कच्चिन्महर्षेस्त्रविधं तपस्पत् <ls>R. 5. 5</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 23.</ls> ({%b%}) Cost, sacrifice; प्राणव्ययेनापि मया विधेयः <ls>Māl. 4. 5.</ls> <ls>Ku. 3. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Hindrance, obstacle; भूयस्तपोव्ययो मा भूत् <ls>R. 15. 37.</ls> {@--3@} Decay, decline, overthrow, downfall. {@--4@} Expenditure, expense, outlay, spending, applying to use (<ab>opp.</ab> आय); आये दुःख व्यये दुःख धिगर्थाः कष्टसंश्रयाः <ls>Pt. 1. 163</ls>; आयधिकं व्ययं करोति ‘he lives beyond his means’; <ls>R. 5. 12</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 11.</ls> {@--5@} Extravagance, prodigality.
